name: AVCaptureManualExposureBracketedStillImageSettings
desc: A configuration for defining bracketed photo captures in terms of specific exposure and ISO values.

items.name: class func manualExposureSettings(exposureDuration: CMTime, iso: Float) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a configuration of still image settings using the specified exposure duration and ISO.

items.name: var iso: Float
items.desc: The ISO for the still image.

items.name: var exposureDuration: CMTime
items.desc: The exposure duration for the still image.
